title: A serif with Etelka
content:
I'm looking for a serif that would compliment Stormtype's Etelka Light Pro Bold. Etelka would be used subtitles and the serif is for the body text of technical/creative reports pertaining to urabn design.

[http://www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/typefaces-33-etelka-light-...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015182420/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/typefaces-33-etelka-light-pro-bold "http://www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/typefaces-33-etelka-light-pro-bold")

Many Thanks
author: JB01

comments.content: I think Storm recommends his own Walbaum Text, but I'm not sure if it's contemporary enough for you.

Did you try Hoefler & Frere-Jones' new [Chronicle Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015182420/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100032)?

Better yet may be their [Mercury Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015182420/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100017).
